title: Herbed venison cutlets with skordalia and beetroot and jalapeno relish
description: Skordalia is a garlicky Greek mashed potato dish often served as a dip or with grilled meats. John Torode's version is less pungent than some, but delicious all the same.
ingredients: 4 small beetroot, cooked, peeled and roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
small handful chopped tarragon, flatleaf parsley, sage and chervil
2 free-range eggs, beaten with a little milk
12 venison cutlets (from the centre of the rack)
